title: Donald Trump on the issues, in under 500 words
text:

University of Pennsylvania Date filed for re-election: Jan. 20, 2017

Jan. 20, 2017 Previous roles: Real-estate developer, TV personality

1 fun thing about Trump:

Trump is the first sitting U.S. president to enter North Korea.

Editor's note: This piece has been updated with the latest information and to clarify that Jan. 20, 2017, was the date Trump filed for re-election.
description: Trump is back on the campaign trail, hoping to be re-elected for a second term.
